actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the retirement of customs and immigration inspectors.

summary.text: Entitles Federal customs and immigration inspectors to the same retirement benefits as Federal law enforcement officers and firefighters. Permits the appropriate agency to set minimum and maximum ages for such inspectors.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the retirement of customs and immigration inspectors.
